description.value: You apply your flashy techniques to thrown weapons as easily as melee attacks. You apply your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.Precise Strike] damage on ranged Strikes you make with a thrown weapon within that weapon's first range increment. The thrown weapon must be an agile or finesse weapon. This also allows you to make a thrown weapon ranged Strike for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Confident Finisher] and any other finisher that includes a Strike that can benefit from your precise strike.
